page.title: 16GOOSTREY VILLAGE HALL
page.content:
The Village Hall building is shared with the Infant department of the local school. The teaching areas are not used by the public but the rest of the building - hall,lounge,stage and dressing rooms - is available for use by the school and the community. Several clubs hold their meetings in the village hall.
Last week a day centre was set up. This is intended as a meeting place for lonely or housebound people. Volunteers collect the members and assist with running the activities. It is hoped to establish close links with the school. Already the junior children have helped to choose a name for the centre, made suggestions for activities (including French cricket!) and entertained the members with a performance of Pinnochio.
